results.name: Monsters and Warriors - Onet Match Connect (itch)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: I3-2130
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intergrated
  • Storage: 283 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Some of the later levels need more processing power than than the original levels. Could get it to run on weaker hardware.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 4300g
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Graphics
  • Storage: 283 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: This is the specs the game was tested on.

results.name: Next Story - The Brave of Deric
